name: Abin Sur, Green Lantern of Ungara
effect:
Willpower 3
When Abin Sur becomes stunned, you may KO him. If you do, search your deck for a Green Lantern character card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
“I cannot continue, Hal Jordan. You must do it for me.”

name: Alan Scott, Keeper of the Starheart
effect:
Willpower 9
“And I shall shed my light over dark evil, for the dark things cannot stand the light, the light of the Green Lantern!”

name: Anti-Green Lantern, Army
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)
Willpower 1
At the start of the recovery phase, KO Anti-Green Lantern.
"Let us show them what 'darkest night' really means."

name: Anti-Matter Cannon
effect: Exhaust an Anti-Matter character you control >>> Replace target location. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Anti-Matter Universe
effect:
As an additional cost to flip Anti-Matter Universe, exhaust four characters you control.
Whenever an opponent draws a card, if you control an Anti-Matter character, that opponent loses 2 endurance.
The bright light of our universe casts a dark shadow.

name: Anti-Monitor, Architect of Destruction
effect:
KO a character or resource you control >>> Each of your opponents KO's a character or resource he controls. Use this power only during the combat phase.
Having taken control of Qward, the Anti-Monitor became locked in a million-year stalemate with the Monitor.

name: Apokoliptian Hospitality
effect:
As an additional cost to play Apokoliptian Hospitality, exhaust a character you control.
Target stunned character an opponent controls cannot be recovered or KO'd this turn. If you control a Darkseid's Elite character, that stunned character's controller loses endurance equal to that character's cost.

name: Appa Ali Apsa, Mad God
effect:
Willpower 8
Characters your opponents control lose reinforcement and cannot gain reinforcement.
Completely mad, Appa Ali Apsa was responsible for the creation of Mosaic World.

name: Arisia, Green Lantern of Graxos IV
effect:
Willpower 1
Each Green Lantern character you control gets +X ATK while attacking a character with greater cost, where X is the willpower of that Green Lantern character.
"From lantern comes the gift we give, to shed light's grace on all that live!"

name: Armies of Qward
effect:
You may return an Army character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.
Ongoing: Army characters you control have the team affiliations of each other Army character you control.

name: Azrael as Batman, Knightfall
effect:
You are considered to control Batman.
Whenever Azrael stuns an attacker, that attacker's controller loses endurance equal to its cost.
One knight has fallen, but another rises from his shadow.

name: Banished to the Anti-Matter Universe
effect:
Play Banished to the Anti-Matter Universe only if you control an Anti-Matter character.
Choose an unequipped, unprotected character an opponent controls. If that character is visible, that opponent moves that character to his hidden area.
Ongoing: The chosen character cannot move to the visible area.

name: Bart Allen as Impulse, Hyper-Accelerated
effect:
Exhaust another character you control >>> Ready Bart Allen. Use this power only once per turn.
"I know you can't, but at least try to keep up, okay?"

name: Bat's Belfry
effect: Remove two cards in your hand from the game >>> Whenever target Arkham Inmates character you control attacks a character this turn, exhaust that character. At the start of the next recovery phase, return the cards you removed from the game to your hand.

name: Battered and Broken
effect:
As an additional cost to play Battered and Broken, exhaust an Emerald Enemies character you control.
Characters your opponents control lose reinforcement and cannot gain reinforcement this turn.

name: Battle of Wills
effect: Target attacker cannot be stunned this attack while it has willpower greater than a defender's willpower.

name: Birthing Chamber
effect: Activate >>> If you control four or more characters, draw a card. If you control six or more characters, instead draw two cards, then discard a card.

name: Black Hand, Dark-Hearted Villain
effect:
Willpower 1
At the start of the recovery phase, gain X endurance, where X is the total willpower of characters you control.
"My power wand can absorb your green energy, Lantern! Admit defeat now, and I might be merciful."

name: Blood in the Dark
effect:
Target character you control can attack hidden characters this turn.
Ongoing: Pay 2 endurance >>> Gotham Knights characters you control can attack hidden characters this turn.

name: Boodikka, Green Lantern of Bellatrix
effect:
Willpower 3
Boodikka gets +X ATK while attacking, where X is her willpower.
"Do not counsel me. My rage gives me strength."

name: Book of Oa
effect: At the start of your recruit step, you may look at the top X cards of your deck, where X is the number of characters you control with willpower 2 or greater. If you do, put one of those cards into your hand, put the rest on the bottom of your deck, and discard a card.

name: Breaking Ground, Construct
effect:
As an additional cost to play Breaking Ground, exhaust a character with willpower 1 or greater you control.
Replace target location or ongoing plot twist.
Sometimes you have to think under the box.

name: Brik, Green Lantern of Dryad
effect:
Willpower 1
Whenever you play a Construct plot twist, Brik gets +2 ATK this turn.
"Before I was alone. Now I am surrounded by many, and it is better."

name: Carol Ferris as Star Sapphire, Beloved Enemy
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Willpower 3
Activate >>> Target attacker you control gets +1 ATK this attack for each face-up resource you control.

name: Catcher's Mitt, Construct
effect:
Catcher's Mitt costs 1 less to recruit onto a character with willpower 1 or greater.
Characters you control have reinforcement.
Discard Catcher's Mitt >>> Target character you control has reinforcement this turn. Use this power only if Catcher's Mitt is in your hand.

name: Central Power Battery
effect:
Exhaust any number of characters you control with total willpower 4 or greater >>> Draw a card. Use this power only while you control a Green Lantern character.
Once there was a darkness, full and forever—but then came the light, and then came the life, and then, the light of the Green Lantern . . .

name: Ch'p, Green Lantern of H'lven
effect:
Willpower 6
Boost 2: While each character you control is attacking or defending this turn, it gets +X DEF, where X is its willpower.
“These young’uns gotta learn, you just don’t mess with no mean-eyed furballs!”

name: Children of Forever
effect:
Play Children of Forever only during the recovery phase.
You may return a New Gods character you control to its owner's hand. If you do, you may put a character card with the version Forever People from your hand into your support row exhausted.

name: Chopping Block, Construct
effect:
Chopping Block costs 1 less to recruit onto a character with willpower 1 or greater.
Equipped character has "Activate >>> Remove target stunned character from the game."
Discard Chopping Block and two other cards >>> Remove target stunned character from the game. Use this power only if Chopping Block is in your hand.

name: Coast City
effect:
Activate >>> While target character is protected this turn, it cannot be attacked.
A safe harbor in Hal Jordan's life.
attributes: • Artist: Billy Dallas Patton and Kris Justic

name: Commander, Military Leader of New Genesis
effect: Cosmic: Pay 2 endurance >>> Put a cosmic counter on target character with cosmic you control. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Cosmic Conflict
effect: Move target hidden attacker you control to your visible area. That character gets +4 ATK this attack.

name: Council of Power
effect:
As an additional cost to flip Council of Power, exhaust four characters you control.
Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, if you control a Manhunter character, each of your opponents loses 2 endurance for each card in his hand, then gains 2 endurance for each card in your hand.

name: Damsel in Distress, Construct
effect:
As an additional cost to play Damsel in Distress, exhaust an Emerald Enemies character you control.
Choose a character an opponent controls. If that character is hidden, its controller moves it to his visible area. When that character becomes stunned by an attacker this turn, KO the chosen character.

name: Darkseid Undenied
effect:
Replace target non-ongoing plot twist an opponent controls. Each player loses endurance equal to the cost of that plot twist.
Ongoing: Exhaust a Darkseid's Elite character you control >>> Replace target non-ongoing plot twist an opponent controls.

name: Dead-Eye, Qwardian Conglomerate
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Dead-Eye cannot team attack.
Whenever Dead-Eye stuns a character, KO that character and KO Dead-Eye.

name: Death of Superman
effect:
As an additional cost to play Death of Superman, exhaust a Revenge Squad character you control.
KO target stunned character.
Ongoing: Whenever a stunned character an opponent controls is put into a KO'd pile during the combat phase, that opponent reveals his hand and discards each card with the same name as that character.

name: Dimming of the Starheart
effect:
Target character gets -5 willpower and loses flight this turn.
For all its might, the Starheart was powerless against wood.

name: Dr. Bedlam, Psionic Being
effect:
When Dr. Bedlam comes into play, choose an opponent.
Dr. Bedlam gets -1 ATK and -1 DEF for each face-up resource the chosen opponent controls.

name: Dr. Ebenezer Darrk, Original Leader of the League
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Dr. Ebenezer Darrk gets +1 ATK for each stunned character you control.
Whenever you flip a location, Dr. Ebenezer Darrk gets +1 DEF this turn.

name: Dr. Light, Master of Holograms
effect:
Willpower 2
Activate >>> Put target character card with cost 2 or less from your KO'd pile into your front row unless you control a character with the same name. Use this power only during your recruit step.

name: Dr. Polaris, Dr. Neal Emerson
effect:
Willpower 2
Whenever Dr. Polaris attacks, you may exhaust target unprotected character.
Boost 2: When Dr. Polaris comes into play, he gets +2 ATK and cannot be stunned while attacking this turn.
“Dolt, your bullets can’t harm the master of magnetism!”

name: Dr. Ub'X, Galactic Conqueror
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)
Willpower 2
At the start of the recovery phase, each of your opponents KO's a stunned character he controls.

name: Elasti-Man, Qwardian Conglomerate
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Elasti-Man gets -3 ATK and +3 DEF while defending.

name: Element Man, Qwardian Conglomerate
effect:
Concealed—Optional
Willpower 3
Move any number of hidden Anti-Matter characters you control to your visible area >>> Replace that number of resources you control. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Emerald City, Construct
effect:
Play Emerald City only if you control four or fewer resources.
Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, discard three cards. If you do, recover each stunned Green Lantern character you control. Otherwise, KO each stunned character you control.

name: Emerald Dawn
effect: You may KO a non-stunned character with willpower 1 or greater you control. If you do, search your deck for an affiliated character card with willpower 1 or greater, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Emerald Twilight
effect:
Play Emerald Twilight only if you control an Emerald Enemies character.
KO target stunned character if its cost is less than the total willpower of characters you control.
I need more power, and nobody is going to stand in my way.

name: Empire of Tears
effect:
As an additional cost to flip Empire of Tears, KO two characters you control unless you KO two resources you control.
Activate >>> Target Emerald Enemies character you control gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF this attack.
The last bastion of chaos.
attributes: • Artist: Billy Dallas Patton and Kris Justic

name: Evil Star, Servant of the Star-Band
effect:
Willpower 5
Activate, KO X characters you control >>> KO target character if its cost is less than or equal to X. If you do, that character's controller loses endurance equal to that character's cost.

name: Fatality, Yrra Cynril
effect:
At the start of the recovery phase, each player KO's a character he controls.
“For each life lost on my homeworld, a Green Lantern will pay.”

name: Femme Fatality
effect: Target Emerald Enemies attacker you control gets +3 ATK this attack. You may KO a resource you control. If you do, whenever that attacker stuns a defender this attack, KO that defender.

name: Fiero, Qwardian Conglomerate
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Willpower 2
Activate >>> Target player loses 3 endurance. If Fiero is hidden, that player loses 6 endurance instead.

name: Fifth Dimension
effect: Activate >>> Remove target non-stunned character you control from the game. At the start of the next draw phase, if that character card has the Revenge Squad team affiliation, put it into your front row. (A card in the removed-from-game zone has only its printed affiliation.)

name: Fire Support
effect: Target defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack. If that defender is ready and has the Manhunter affiliation, you may exhaust it. If you do, attackers in this attack cannot ready during the recovery phase this turn.

name: Fists of the Guardians, Oan Enforcers
effect:
Activate >>> Target character gets -X willpower this turn, where X is that character's willpower.
"The Guardians have ordered your presence. Disobedience demands destruction."

name: Force Sphere, Construct
effect:
Target defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack. If that defender is ready and has the Green Lantern affiliation, you may exhaust it. If you do, it has reinforcement this attack.
"This I swear: as long as I have breath, nothing shall harm you."

name: From Qward With Hate
effect:
Play From Qward With Hate only during the combat phase.
You may KO two resources and two Anti-Matter characters you control. If you do, each of your opponents KO's a total of three characters and/or resources he controls.

name: Frostbite, Qwardian Conglomerate
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Willpower 2
Activate >>> Target stunned character cannot ready this turn.

name: G'Nort, Green Lantern of G'Newt
effect:
Willpower 1
Other characters you control with willpower 1 or greater get +1 ATK and +1 DEF.
Armed with a fake power ring from the Qwardians, G’Nort policed an empty sector of space and later joined the Justice League Antarctica.

name: Ganthet, Last Guardian
effect:
Willpower 6
At the start of the recovery phase, gain X endurance, where X is the total willpower of characters you control.

name: Garth as Aqualad, Atlantean Ambassador
effect:
At the start of the combat phase, put the top two cards of your deck into your KO'd pile.
The destiny of the Idylists lies in his blood, waiting to be realized.

name: Gnaxos, Arena Robot
effect:
Boost 3: Gnaxos comes into play with five +1 ATK / +1 DEF counters on it.
Although it was designed to destroy the Corps, it ended up turning against its masters.

name: Golden Death
effect: Target attacker you control gets +2 ATK this attack. If that attacker has the Emerald Enemies affiliation, exhausted defenders lose reinforcement and cannot gain reinforcement this attack.

name: Goldface, Keith Kenyon
effect:
As an additional cost to recruit Goldface, discard two Emerald Enemies character cards.
KO a resource you control >>> Goldface gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF this attack. Use this power only once per turn.
“Come now, Green Lantern, surely you know your ring is powerless against yellow, or, in my case—GOLD!”

name: Governor Tozad, Planetary Commander
effect:
Activate >>> If target player controls more characters than you, that player exhausts a ready character he controls. Use this power only during the combat phase.
"Some seek to rule through justice. I say it's better to rule through terror."

name: Grandmaster, Manhunter Leader
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)
Move any number of hidden
: to your visible area >>> Each of those characters gets +2 ATK this turn. Use this power only once per turn.
“We are those whose moment must come—and the hour has struck for mass murder!”

name: Grayven, Son of Darkseid
effect:
Willpower 3
While Grayven is attacking a defender and you control more face-up resources than that defender's controller, that defender loses reinforcement and cannot gain reinforcement this attack.

name: Green Lantern Ring
effect:
Transferable (At the start of your formation step, you may transfer this equipment to a character you control.)
Equipped character gets +2 willpower and has the Green Lantern affiliation.
"You'll do."

name: Guardians Reborn
effect:
As an additional cost to play Guardians Reborn, exhaust any number of Green Lantern characters you control with total willpower 3 or greater.
Recover target stunned Green Lantern character you control.

name: Guy Gardner, Strong Arm of the Corps
effect:
Willpower 2
Guy Gardner gets +X ATK while attacking, where X is his willpower.
Boost 1: When Guy Gardner comes into play, characters you control get +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: Guy Gardner, Warrior
effect:
Willpower 2
Unaffiliated characters you control can team attack as though they had all team affiliations.
“I’ve got Vuldarian biology, man. I don’t need a ring.”

name: Hal Jordan as Spectre, Mortal Avatar
effect:
Whenever a character you control becomes stunned, each of your opponents loses endurance equal to its cost.
As the mortal avatar of the Spectre, Hal Jordan metes out vengeance . . . and seeks redemption.

name: Hal Jordan, Green Lantern of Earth
effect:
Willpower 3
Hal Jordan wanted to be a test pilot, but fate had a different plan.

name: Hal Jordan, Green Lantern of Sector 2814
effect:
Willpower 5
Hal Jordan gets +3 ATK and +3 DEF while you control no other characters.
“I’ve got all the power in the universe literally at my fingertips.”

name: Hal Jordan, Parallax
effect:
Willpower 5
Discard a card >>> Hal Jordan gets +5 willpower this turn.
Power corrupts. Absolute power is Parallax.

name: Hal Jordan, Reborn
effect:
Willpower 6
While the total willpower of characters you control is 20 or greater, you cannot lose the game and your opponents cannot win the game.

name: Hard-Traveling Heroes
effect:
Choose two or more team affiliations among characters with willpower 1 or greater you control. If you do, draw a card.
Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your hand, deck, and KO'd pile that have any of the chosen affiliations have all of the chosen affiliations.

name: Harlequin, Molly Mayne-Scott
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)
Willpower 2
Whenever Harlequin causes breakthrough to a player, that player discards a card.
“You have nice eyes, Green Lantern, but you’ll never catch me!”

name: Hector Hammond, Super-Futuristic Mind
effect:
Willpower 2
Hector Hammond gets +4 ATK and +4 DEF while you control five or more resources.
"I am a creature from one thousand years in your future. I am evolution embodied. You cannot defeat evolution."

name: Helping Hand, Construct
effect: Target defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack for each other character with willpower 1 or greater you control.
attributes: • Artist: Billy Dallas Patton and Kris Justic

name: Henry King Jr. as Brainwave, Psionic Manipulator
effect:
Willpower 1

name: Highmaster, Supreme Leader
effect:
Activate, remove X Manhunter character cards in your KO'd pile from the game >>> Target player loses X endurance.

name: Hostage Situation
effect: Ongoing: Exhaust two Revenge Squad characters you control >>> If Hostage Situation is in your resource row, KO it. If you do, search your deck for an ongoing plot twist card, reveal it, and put it face down into your resource row. Shuffle your deck.

name: House of El
effect:
Activate >>> Move a character you control. If you control a Team Superman character, move each character you control instead.
Krypton’s most brilliant scientific minds could not save its residents from their own blind pride.

name: Hush, Mystery Man
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)

name: In Evil Star's Evil Clutches
effect: Ongoing: Return a face-down resource you control to its owner's hand >>> Choose a character an opponent controls. That character loses flight this turn. You may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row. Use this power only once per turn.

name: In Remembrance
effect:

name: In the Hands of Qward
effect:
As an additional cost to play In the Hands of Qward, exhaust any number of Anti-Matter characters you control with total willpower 7 or greater.

name: Invisible Destroyer, Subconscious Entity
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)

Willpower 1

name: Jackhammer, Construct
effect: Target attacker you control gets +2 DEF this attack. If that attacker has the Green Lantern affiliation and has a lesser cost than a defender, it gets an additional +5 DEF this attack.

Willpower 2

Willpower 3

effect:
Willpower 5

effect: Boost 1: When Manhunter Excavator comes into play, put target Army character card with cost 3 or less from your KO'd pile into your front row.

name: Manhunter Lantern, Power Ring Thief

Willpower 4

effect:

name: Manhunter Science
effect:
As an additional cost to play Manhunter Science, exhaust two
:.

"Struggle all you want, Lantern. You belong to us now."

name: Manhunter Sniper, Army
effect: Activate, pay 1 endurance >>> If target opponent has more endurance than you, that opponent loses 3 endurance.

name: Manhunter Soldier, Army
effect:
Pay 2 resource points >>> You may put an Army Manhunter character card with cost 3 or less from your hand into your front row.
"Every one of us that falls is replaced by another, just as devoted as the one who came before."

name: Manhunter Spacecraft
effect:
Pay 1 resource point, discard a card >>> Search your deck for an Army Manhunter character card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. Use this power only once per turn.
"From here, my brothers, we will watch the end of our enemy."

name: Manhunter Transphere
effect: Target Manhunter character you control gets +3 ATK this attack. At the start of the recovery phase, KO that character.

name: Mark Shaw, Manhunter
effect:
Discard a Manhunter character card >>> Mark Shaw gets +2 ATK this attack.
Boost 2: When Mark Shaw comes into play, return up to three Manhunter character cards from your KO'd pile to your hand.

name: Mean Green Machine, Construct
effect:
Move target Green Lantern character with willpower 1 or greater you control. If Mean Green Machine is in your resource row, draw a card.
"A Lantern never walks."

name: Millennium
effect:
As an additional cost to play Millennium, exhaust a character you control.
Choose two different team affiliations among characters you control. If you do, draw a card.
Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your hand, deck, and KO'd pile that have either of the chosen affiliations have both of the chosen affiliations.

name: Mogo
effect:
Activate >>> Target Green Lantern character you control gets +1 willpower this turn. If you control six or more resources, that character gets +2 willpower this turn instead.
Mogo doesn't socialize.

name: Mosaic World
effect:
Characters you control can team attack as though they had all team affiliations.
Characters you control can reinforce and be reinforced as though they had all team affiliations.
"In the name of peace, we will build this new world with our hands and hearts."

name: Mouse Trap, Construct
effect: Reveal Mouse Trap, exhaust any number of characters you control with total willpower 6 or greater >>> Put Mouse Trap into your front row. At the start of the recovery phase, KO Mouse Trap. Use this power only during the combat phase and only if Mouse Trap is in your hand.

name: Myrwhydden, Mightiest of Mages
effect:
Willpower 2
KO a resource you control >>> Target attacker you control gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF this attack for each face-up resource you control. Use this power only once per turn.
"And indeed would you be remiss had you forgotten one of your greatest foes . . . MYRWHYDDEN!”

name: Nero Unleashed
effect:
Target defender you control gets +2 ATK this attack. If that defender has the Anti-Matter affiliation, you may move it to your hidden area.
"Come, Green Lantern. Shall we battle for the light?"

name: Nero, Qwardian Puppet
effect:
Willpower 5
KO a non-stunned Anti-Matter character you control >>> Target player loses endurance equal to that character's willpower.
He’s what happens when you give a homicidal maniac a Qwardian power ring.

name: No Evil Shall Escape Our Sight, Construct
effect:
Choose two different team affiliations among characters you control.
Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your hand, deck, and KO'd pile that have either of the chosen affiliations have both of the chosen affiliations.

name: No Man Escapes the Manhunters
effect:
Target character gets -3 DEF while defending this turn. If that character is hidden, its controller moves it to his visible area.
Run. Hide. It makes no difference.

name: Oa
effect:
As an additional cost to flip Oa, discard a Green Lantern character card.
Activate >>> Target attacker you control gets +X ATK this attack, where X is its willpower.
Not classified as part of any sector, Oa sits at the very center of the universe.

name: Olapet, Green Lantern of Southern Goldstar
effect:
Willpower 1
Olapet gets +5 willpower while you control five or more resources.
Boost 1: When Olapet comes into play, search your deck for a Green Lantern character card with cost 1 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. Gain 1 resource point.

name: Only a Friend Can Betray You
effect: Target attacker you control gets +2 DEF this attack. If that attacker has the Manhunter affiliation, you may return a character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.

name: Orinda
effect:
When an Army Manhunter character comes into play under your control, you may move it to your hidden area.
The Manhunter homeworld, cloaked in the darkest corner of the universe.

name: Owlman, Crime Syndicate
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Boost 2: Whenever a defender an opponent controls becomes stunned this turn, that opponent loses endurance equal to that defender's cost.

name: Pan, Manhunter Duplicate
effect: Whenever Pan causes breakthrough to a player, choose a non-character card name. Search through that player's deck for all cards with that name and remove them from the game. That player shuffles his deck.

name: Parademons, Army
effect:
Whenever Parademons attacks, you may replace target non-ongoing plot twist an opponent controls.
"We will fill the sky with so many soldiers our enemy won't know where to begin."

name: Pest Control, Construct
effect: Exhaust target ready defender you control. That defender gets +4 DEF this attack and cannot ready this turn.

name: Plans Within Plans
effect:
Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, put the top card of your deck into your KO'd pile.
Exhaust a Manhunter character you control, replace Plans Within Plans >>> Return target card from your KO'd pile to your hand.

name: Power Armor Elite, Army
effect:
Activate >>> Target character gets - 1 DEF this attack. That character gets -2 DEF this attack instead if you control a character named Lex Luthor.
“Your job is simple, gentlemen: Destroy Superman.”

name: Power Ring, Crime Syndicate
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Willpower 5
Boost 2: While Power Ring is attacking or defending this turn, he gets +X ATK and +X DEF, where X is his willpower.

name: Power Surge
effect:
Discard up to three cards. Target character gets +1 willpower this turn and an additional +1 willpower for each card you discarded.
"I . . . I . . . I can feel . . . the whole universe!"

name: Prison Planet
effect:
Visible Emerald Enemies characters you control get +2 ATK.
Characters you control lose reinforcement, cannot gain reinforcement, and cannot team attack.
Isolated from time, space, and each other, the prisoners wander with no hope or purpose.

name: Prisoner of a Mad God
effect:
Play Prisoner of a Mad God only during your attack step.
You may exhaust any number of Emerald Enemies characters you control with total willpower 5 or greater. If you do, exhaust target character, and that character cannot ready this turn.

name: Q Energy
effect:
Play Q Energy only during your attack step.
You may exhaust any number of Anti-Matter characters you control with total willpower 4 or greater. If you do, exhaust target character, and that character's controller loses endurance equal to that character's cost.

name: Q Field
effect: Move any number of target hidden Anti-Matter characters you control to your visible area. If you moved at least one character and Q Field is in your resource row, draw a card.

name: Qward
effect:
At the start of the recovery phase, stun all characters with 0 DEF.
Exhaust an Anti-Matter character you control >>> Target character gets -1 DEF this turn.
As Oa stands as the source of all light in our universe, Qward is the source of all darkness in theirs . . .
attributes: • Artist: Billy Dallas Patton and Kris Justic

name: Qwardian Council Hall
effect:
Activate >>> Target Anti-Matter attacker you control gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF this attack.
Discard a character card with willpower 1 or greater >>> Ready Qwardian Council Hall.

name: Qwardian Pincer
effect:
Target attacker you control gets +1 ATK this attack for each exhausted character with cost 2 or more you control.
"There's too many . . . "

name: Qwardian Watchdog, Gatekeeper
effect:
Qwardian Watchdog cannot attack.
Whenever Qwardian Watchdog becomes stunned, move it to your hidden area.
"Traveling to the Anti-Matter Universe isn't the problem. Getting by what guards the gate . . . now that's a problem."

name: Qwardians, Army
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)
Whenever a player loses endurance, if that player has less than 30 endurance and Qwardians is hidden, move it to your visible area.
Activate >>> If target player has 30 or more endurance, that player loses 2 endurance.

name: Ragman, Rory Regan
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)
Boost 1: When Ragman comes into play, you may return him to his owner's hand. If you do, whenever a character an opponent controls becomes stunned this turn, KO it.

name: Rain of Acorns, Construct
effect: Ongoing: Exhaust a character with willpower 1 or greater you control >>> Exhaust target unprotected character. Use this power only during your attack step.

name: Rebellion on Oa
effect:
As an additional cost to play Rebellion on Oa, exhaust a Manhunter character you control.
Each opponent who controls fewer stunned characters than you do KO's each stunned character he controls.
Blinded by pride, the Guardians never foresaw their creation turning against them.

name: Recharging the Ring
effect:
Exhaust any number of characters you control each with willpower 1 or greater. Replace up to X resources you control and gain X endurance, where X is the number of characters you exhausted this way.
"Every Lantern from Earth has become a legend. Perhaps the Guardians’ prophecy was correct . . ."

name: Reciting the Oath
effect:
As an additional cost to play Reciting the Oath, exhaust four characters you control.
Ongoing: While you control a Green Lantern character, characters you control have reinforcement.

name: Reign of Terra
effect: Ongoing: Characters you control lose all team affiliations other than Deathstroke and cannot gain team affiliations other than Deathstroke.
attributes: • Artist: Billy Dallas Patton and Kris Justic

name: Remoni-Notra as Star Sapphire, Obsessed Warrior Princess
effect:
Willpower 4
Whenever an attacker you control stuns a defender, if that attacker's willpower is greater than that defender's cost, KO that defender.
"You will bow before me, Lantern, even if I spend my last breath to make it so."

name: Rocket Red, Manhunter Sleeper
effect:
As an additional cost to play Rocket Red, KO two
:.
“My friends, it is time I tell you a secret . . . ”

name: Rot Lop Fan, F-Sharp Bell of the Obsidian Deeps
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)
Willpower 2
Pay 2 endurance >>> Target Green Lantern character you control can attack hidden characters this turn.

name: S.T.A.R. Labs
effect:
Pay 3 resource points >>> Put a cosmic counter on target character with cosmic you control.
Pay 1 resource point >>> Put a cosmic counter on target Team Superman character with cosmic you control. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Salakk, Green Lantern of Slyggia
effect:
Willpower 2
"Old Picklehead actually prefers the solitude of space to the noise of planets.”

name: Scarab, Qwardian Conglomerate
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Scarab gets -3 ATK and +3 DEF while visible.
attributes: • Artist: Billy Dallas Patton and Kris Justic

name: Sector 2814
effect:
Sector 2814 is not unique.
At the start of the recovery phase, gain 1 endurance for each character with willpower 1 or greater you control.
“As is well known to our Green Lantern Corps, the next race of immortals to be born in this universe will come from this world!”

name: Sensei, Martial Arts Master
effect: At the start of the combat phase, if you control another League of Assassins character, you may put the top card of your deck face down into your resource row. If you do, at the start of the recovery phase this turn, KO a resource you control.

name: Shadow Creatures, Army
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)
Willpower 1
They were once Qwardians, before the Anti-Monitor transformed them into his dark minions.

name: Shadows of the Past
effect:
Play Shadows of the Past only during your attack step.
While you control a League of Assassins character this turn, characters your opponents control lose all team affiliations. Characters you control cannot cause breakthrough while attacking characters this turn.

name: Shock Troops
effect:
Target character you control gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF this attack if it has the same cost as another character you control.
"Forward! Forward! Forward!"

name: Sinestro Defiant
effect:
Target defender you control gets +2 ATK this attack. If that defender has the Emerald Enemies affiliation, you may KO a resource you control. If you do, whenever an attacker or defender becomes stunned this attack, KO it.
"I don’t need strength when I am so vitally aware of your weaknesses."

name: Sinestro, Enemy of the Corps
effect:
Willpower 6
At the start of the recovery phase, each of your opponents with endurance less than the total willpower of characters you control loses the game.
His ring isn’t what makes him dangerous. His twisted mind is more than enough.

name: Sinestro, Green Lantern of Korugar
effect:
Willpower 6
Whenever an attacker stuns a defender you control other than Sinestro, stun that attacker.
"Order must be kept at all costs."

name: Sinestro, Lantern in Exile
effect:
Willpower 5
Activate >>> The controller of target visible character moves that character to his hidden area.
When the Corps banished him, the Qwardians found a new champion.

name: Sleeper Agent, Manhunter Sleeper
effect: Reveal Sleeper Agent >>> If you control a Manhunter character, put Sleeper Agent into your front row. Use this power only during your recruit step and only while Sleeper Agent is in your resource row.

name: Slipstream, Qwardian Conglomerate
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Slipstream gets +1 ATK while hidden.
Pay 3 endurance >>> Ready Slipstream. Use this power only once per turn and only while Slipstream is visible.

name: Soldiers of New Genesis, Army
effect: Cosmic: Soldiers of New Genesis has invulnerability.

name: Solomon Grundy, Born on a Monday
effect:
At the start of your recruit step, if Solomon Grundy is in your KO'd pile, you may return him to your hand. If you do, discard a card.
Boost 2: Solomon Grundy comes into play with five +1 ATK / +1 DEF counters on him.

name: Sonar, Dastardly Discord
effect:
Willpower 1
Activate >>> Target player exhausts a ready character he controls. Use this power only during your attack step.
“Keep talking, Lantern. The more sound you make, the more powerful I become.”

name: Space Bears, Construct
effect: Reveal Space Bears, exhaust any number of characters you control with total willpower 4 or greater >>> Put Space Bears into your front row. At the start of the recovery phase, KO Space Bears. Use this power only during the combat phase and only if Space Bears is in your hand.

name: St'nlli, Super-Qwardian
effect:
Willpower 1
When St'nlli comes into play, move each Anti-Matter character you control to your hidden area, then move any number of Anti-Matter characters you control to your visible area.

name: Starlings, Army
effect:
Starlings comes into play exhausted.
Whenever Starlings becomes stunned, KO it.
Activate, pay 1 resource point >>> You may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for up to two character cards named Starlings and put them into your front row.

name: Stealing the Light
effect:
Play Stealing the Light only during your attack step.
You may exhaust a character you control. If you do, target player reveals X cards from his hand, where X is the willpower of the character you exhausted. Choose one of the revealed cards. That player discards that card.

name: Sturmer, War Dog
effect:
Discard Sturmer and another card >>> Search your deck for a New Gods character card with cost 6 or more, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. Use this power only if Sturmer is in your hand.
Sturmer cannot attack unless he team attacks.

name: Superman, Returned
effect:
Activate >>> Target character has invulnerability this turn. Use this power only during the build phase.
Superman's return from the dead left him weakened, but not weak.

name: Supermanhunter, Kryptonite Armor
effect:
Pay 3 endurance >>> Remove any number of counters from target character an opponent controls.
With its kryptonite armor and weapons, it was designed to destroy a man. A single man.

name: Superwoman, Crime Syndicate
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
While Superwoman is visible, she has invulnerability.
“You’re weak and pathetic, Diana. You’ll never be half the woman I am.”

name: Sweeping Up, Construct
effect:
As an additional cost to play Sweeping Up, exhaust a character with willpower 1 or greater you control.
Return target stunned character to its owner's hand. Look at the top X cards of your deck, where X is the willpower of the character you exhausted.

name: Tattooed Man, Abel Tarrant
effect:
Willpower 2
Tattooed Man gets -1 ATK and -1 DEF for each resource you control.
Covered in tattoos of weapons and fire, his body provides the perfect arsenal.

name: The Fall of Oa
effect: Ongoing: Exhaust a Manhunter character you control >>> Target player puts the top card of his deck into his KO'd pile. Then, if that player has no cards in his deck, put your deck into your hand.

name: The Kent Farm
effect:
Team Superman characters you control get +3 ATK and +3 DEF while team attacking.
Team Superman characters you control cannot attack characters unless they team attack.

name: The Manhunters are a Myth
effect:
As an additional cost to play The Manhunters are a Myth, discard a Manhunter character card.
Choose one: Manhunter characters you control cannot be the target of plot twists this turn; or you cannot be the target of plot twists this turn.

name: The Ring Has Chosen
effect:
Search your deck for an affiliated character card with cost less than or equal to the total willpower of characters you controlled as you played The Ring Has Chosen. Reveal that card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Discard a card.
“You did not find me, Hal Jordan. My power ring found you.”

name: The Shark, T. S. Smith
effect:
Willpower 1
The Shark gets +1 ATK for each face-up resource you control.
“Does that frighten you, meat? Then let the Shark show you the true meaning of fear!”

name: Thunderous Onslaught
effect: Target attacker you control gets +2 ATK this attack. If that attacker is hidden and has the Anti-Matter affiliation, you may move it to your visible area. If you do, it cannot be stunned this attack.
attributes: • Artist: Billy Dallas Patton and Kris Justic

name: Tomar Re, Green Lantern of Xudar
effect:
Willpower 2
Discard two cards >>> Search your deck for a Construct card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Tomar Tu, Green Lantern of Xudar
effect:
Willpower 2
While Tomar Tu is protecting a character, that character cannot be attacked.
A brother of Tomar Re, Tomar Tu comes from one of the Xudarian Mosaic cities.

name: Trapped in the Sciencells
effect:
Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, each player loses 1 endurance for each face-down resource he controls.
"Each cell contains a deadly enemy . . . we cannot allow even one to escape."

name: Two-Face, Split Personality
effect:
If you would mulligan, you may instead reveal Two-Face from your hand. If you do, put any number of cards from your hand on the top of your deck, then mulligan.
At the start of your attack step, choose even or odd cost. Exhaust each character your opponents control with the chosen cost.

name: Ultraman, Crime Syndicate
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
While Ultraman is protecting an Anti-Matter character, that character cannot be attacked.
Whenever Ultraman stuns a defender, KO that defender.

name: Underground Complex
effect: Remove two Army Manhunter character cards in your KO'd pile from the game >>> Return an Army Manhunter character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.

name: Uppercut, Construct
effect:
Target attacker you control gets +X ATK this attack, where X is its willpower. That attacker cannot cause breakthrough this attack.
"There's a reason it's called hard light."

name: Virman Vundabar, Military Leader of Apokolips
effect:
Activate >>> Exhaust target character if its cost is less than the number of face-down resources its controller controls.
"Stay where you are, you New Genesis scum."

name: Weaponers of Qward, Army
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)
Activate >>> Target character gets -1 DEF this turn.
Every weapon they forge serves the same purpose: destroying the Matter Universe.

name: Willworld
effect: Activate >>> Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put all revealed character cards with willpower 1 or greater into your hand. Put all other revealed cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. For each card put into your hand this way, discard a card.

name: Xallarap, Anti-Green Lantern Corps
effect:
As an additional cost to recruit Xallarap, reveal an Anti-Matter character card from your hand.
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)
Willpower 3
At the start of the recovery phase, KO Xallarap.

name: Yellow Impurity
effect: Target character gets -2 willpower this turn and -2 DEF while defending this turn.

name: Yellow Power Ring
effect:
Transferable (At the start of your formation step, you may transfer this equipment to a character you control.)
Equipped character gets +2 willpower and has the Anti-Matter affiliation.
"With their rings, they make justice. With ours, we shall make fear."

name: Yokal, The Atrocious
effect:
Concealed (This character comes into play in the hidden area.)
Activate, move Yokal from your hidden area to your visible area >>> While Yokal is defending this turn, he has reinforcement.
attributes: • Artist: Billy Dallas Patton and Kris Justic

name: Zero Hour
effect:
Play Zero Hour only during the combat phase.
Each of your opponents loses X endurance, where X is the total willpower of characters you control.

name: ¡Óle!, Construct
effect:
Target character you control gets +3 ATK this attack if it has the same cost as another character you control.
"Just because my ring can't affect you, Goldface, doesn't mean the rest of the world has the same problem."
